log.content: Make a game of tic-tac-toe. The game should be playable from index.html, but you can create supporting css/js files.

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"content":"Tic Tac Toe

","file_name":"index.html"}

function.name: create_file

log.content: These files will create a basic Tic Tac Toe game that can be played in the browser. The game board is displayed on the index.html page, and the game logic is handled in the script.js file. The style.css file contains any additional CSS styles that may be needed to customize the appearance of the game.
